casebody.data:
IN RE: SKINNER 277A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 28, 2016 Mr. Ira Braswell, IV, Attorney at Law, for Skinner, Mark. Ms. Jenna F. Butler, Attorney at Law, Mr. Alexander C. Dale, Attorney at Law, Wilmington, for Clark, Nancy Bass, et al.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 28th of November 2016 by Respondent:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of November 2016."

Respondent shall have up to and including the 14th day of December 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
